member.name: T:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.SmoothStreaming.SmoothStreamingMediaPlugin
member.summary: Represents a media plug-in that can play multiple-bitrate encoded adaptive media (Smooth Streaming).

member.name: M:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.SmoothStreaming.SmoothStreamingMediaPlugin.Play
member.summary: Starts playing the current media file from its current position.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.SmoothStreaming.SmoothStreamingMediaPlugin.Pause
member.summary: Pauses the currently playing media.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.SmoothStreaming.SmoothStreamingMediaPlugin.Stop
member.summary: Stops playing the current media.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.SmoothStreaming.SmoothStreamingMediaPlugin.RequestLog
member.summary: Requests that this plugin generate a LogEntry via the LogReady event

member.name: M:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.SmoothStreaming.SmoothStreamingMediaPlugin.ClearBuffer(System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Empties the contents of the buffer leaving only the specified amount of buffered time.
member.param: The amount of time to leave in the buffer.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.SmoothStreaming.SmoothStreamingMediaPlugin.Load
member.summary: Loads a plug-in for playing adaptive media.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.SmoothStreaming.SmoothStreamingMediaPlugin.Unload
member.summary: Unloads a plug-in for adaptive media.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.SmoothStreaming.SmoothStreamingMediaPlugin.DownloadStreamData(Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.Primitives.IMediaTrack)
member.summary: Downloads all of the available data from the specified track.
member.param: the track that contains the data to be downloaded.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.SmoothStreaming.SmoothStreamingMediaPlugin.DownloadStreamData(Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.Primitives.IMediaTrack,Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.Primitives.IDataChunk)
member.summary: Downloads the chunk of data that is part of the specified track and has the specified timestamp id.
member.param: the track that contains the data to be downloaded.
the chunk to be downloaded.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.SmoothStreaming.SmoothStreamingMediaPlugin.SetVideoBitrateRange(System.Int64,System.Int64,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Specifies the range of video bitrates that can be downloaded.
member.param: the minimum bitrate that can be downloaded.
the maximum bitrate that can be downloaded.
flush the buffer

member.name: M:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.SmoothStreaming.SmoothStreamingMediaPlugin.SetCacheProvider(System.Object)
member.summary: Specifies the cache provider that should be used.
member.param: the cache provider

member.summary: Schedules an ad to be played by this plugin.
member.param: The source of the ad content.
The delivery method of the ad content.
The duration of the ad content that should be played. If ommitted the plugin will play the full duration of the ad content.
The position within the media where this ad should be played. If ommited ad will begin playing immediately.
The URL where the user should be directed when they click the ad.
Indicates if the timeline of the currently playing media should be paused while the ad is playing.
Another scheduled ad that this ad should be appended to. If ommitted this ad will be scheduled independently.
User data.
Indicates that SSME.ScheduleLinearClip should be called instead of ScheduleClip. pauseTimeline must be false.
member.returns: A reference to the IAdContext that contains information about the scheduled ad.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SilverlightMediaFramework.Plugins.SmoothStreaming.SmoothStreamingMediaPlugin.SeekToLive
member.summary: Attempts to set current playback position to the LivePosition.
member.remarks: This method is used on a live media stream with DVR capabilities, such as an adaptive stream (where the client can scrub to a point on the timeline previous to the live position).

member.summary: Occurs when the plug-in is loaded.
